de.iisys.mmis.rssparser

Class RSSParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iisys.mmis.rssparser.RSSParser

  • public class RSSParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The class RSSParser reads XML files from RSS Feeds, extracts the content of these files and store this content as objects of class Channel. These objects represents referenced articles by objects of class Item. For every article an XML file is generated which has a very similar form as the original file from the feed but contains only the reference to a single article. In addition to a regular RSS file the archived files includes the element "ExtractedText" providing the extracted text from the article itself. The parser uses the Boiler Pipe library for this extraction task.
    Author:
    Richard Goebel

      • parseFeed

        public Channel parseFeed(java.net.URL url,
                java.lang.String lang,
                java.lang.String topic,
                java.lang.String archivedir)
        The function parseFeed reads an RSS feed from the specified URL and generates corresponding files for every contained item to the archive. It returns a channel object representing the content of the feed.
        Parameters:
        url - Location of RSS file
        lang - Language
        topic - specifies a topic (e.g. "politics")
        archivedir - top level directory of archive
        Returns:
        Channel object

        NewsItem
